	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<I>
	Supply
	Chain Solutions
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<B>
<I>
	&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	We
	hold several representation agreements with major manufacturers. Our representation agreements are not on an exclusive basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Our
	Israeli competitors in distribution to the electronic industry include the publicly traded Telsys Ltd. and STG International Electronics
	(1981) Ltd., as well as Nisco Projects Ltd., Eastronics Ltd., Elimec Engineering Ltd. and Teder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Electro Mechanical Engineering Ltd.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	In
	the international market, our competitors are mainly Arrow Electronics International Inc., Avnet Electronics Marketing, TTI Inc.,
	PEI-Genesis Inc., Weco Electrical Connectors Inc., Electro Enterprises Inc., Flame Enterprise Inc., Norstan Electronics Inc.,
	Peerless Electronics Inc. and Future Electronics.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Strategy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company's vision is to become
<B>
</B>
	a
<B>
</B>
	leading provider in the field of RFID and Mobile Solutions and Supply Chain Solutions
	for enterprise logistics and organizational processes.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	key elements of our strategy are as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&#9679;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Expand
	our RFID and Mobile product offerings, mainly through acquisitions of complementary solutions.
	This will include the sale and integration of new complementary hardware and software
	to our existing customer base and sales to new customers;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&#9679;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Expand
	the Supply Chain Solutions division product offerings to our existing customer base and
	to new customers in and outside of Israel. In recent years our Supply Chain division
	expanded its product offerings to include mobile operations for the High&nbsp;Tech industry
	in India, which contributes to the expansion of our global sales.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -18PT">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<B>
	Exchange
	Controls
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<B>
	&nbsp;

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	See
	&ldquo;Item 10D. Exchange Controls.&rdquo;
</FONT>

<EFX_OPERATING_AND_FINANCIAL_REVIEW>
<A NAME="FIS_OPERATING_AND_FINANCIAL_REVIEW"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<U>
	Item
	5:
</U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<U>
	Operating and Financial Review and Prospects
</U>
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	following management&rsquo;s discussion and analysis of financial condition and results of operations should be read in conjunction
	with our financial statements and notes thereto. Certain matters discussed below and throughout this Annual Report are forward-looking
	statements that are based on our beliefs and assumptions as well as information currently available to us. Such forward-looking
	statements may be identified by the use of the words &ldquo;anticipate&rdquo;, &ldquo;believe&rdquo;, &ldquo;estimate&rdquo;,
	&ldquo;expect&rdquo;, &ldquo;plan&rdquo; and similar expressions. Such statements reflect our current views with respect to future
	events and are subject to certain risks and uncertainties. While we believe such forward-looking statements are based on reasonable
	assumptions, should one or more of the underlying assumptions prove incorrect, or these risks or uncertainties materialize, our
	actual results may differ materially from those described herein.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<B>
	Overview
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	BOS
	is a provider of turnkey AIDC mobility solutions and a global distributor of electronic components for the civil aircraft industry,
	defense industry and high technology equipment manufacturers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company&rsquo;s RFID and Mobile products and services assist customers in improving the efficiency of their enterprise logistics,
	enhancing and automating their data collection processes and improving asset tracking.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	BOS
	manages its business in two reportable divisions: RFID and Mobile Solutions (through its subsidiary Dimex), and Supply Chain Solutions
	(through its subsidiary Odem).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<I>
	Revenues
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<I>
	&nbsp;
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company derives its revenues mainly from the sale of products and support services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Revenues
	from product sales, related to both the Supply Chain Solutions and RFID and Mobile Solutions segments, are recognized in accordance
	with SAB 104,
<I>
	Revenue Recognition
</I>
	(&quot;ASC 605&quot;) when delivery has occurred, persuasive evidence of an arrangement
	exists, the vendor's fee is fixed or determinable, no further obligation exists, and collectability is reasonably assured.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 30 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	24
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage30"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Revenues
	from maintenance and support services related to license are recognized ratably over the period of the support contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	For
	revenues from customized software solutions, since the Company is unable to obtain reasonable dependable estimates of the total
	effort required for completion, the Company follows the guidance in ASC 605-35, (&quot;ASC 605-35&quot;), whereby the Company
	applies the completed contract method. Under the completed contract method, all revenue and related costs of revenue are deferred
	and recognized upon completion. Provisions for estimated losses on contracts in process are recognized in the period such losses
	are determined.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<I>
	Costs
	and Operating Expenses
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<I>
	&nbsp;
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Our
	costs associated with a particular project may vary significantly depending on the specific requirements of the customer, the
	terms of the agreement, as well as on the nature of the products. As a result, our gross profits from each project may vary significantly.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	In
	August 2012, we entered into a cooperation agreement with an independent software development company for the maintenance, development
	and support of our software solutions. The selling and marketing of the software solutions continues to be performed by our RFID
	and Mobile Solutions division.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Our
	selling and marketing expenses consist primarily of salaries and related costs, commissions earned by sales, marketing and operational
	personnel, facilities costs, trade show expenses, promotional expenses and overhead costs allocated to selling and marketing activities,
	as well as depreciation expenses and travel costs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Our
	general and administrative expenses consist primarily of salaries and related costs earned by management and financial department,
	allocated overhead costs, office supplies and administrative costs, fees and expenses of our directors, information technology,
	depreciation, and professional service fees, including legal, insurance and audit fees. General and administrative expenses for
	year 2015 and 2016 include expenses related to the acquisition of iDnext Ltd. and Next Line Ltd.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Our
	operating results are significantly affected by, among other things, the level of revenues. Our revenues in any quarter are substantially
	dependent on orders received and delivered in that quarter. As a result, our revenues and income (loss) may fluctuate substantially
	from quarter to quarter. The nature of certain of our expenses is mainly fixed or partially fixed and any fluctuation in revenues
	will generate a significant variation in gross profit and net income (loss).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<BR>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Critical
	accounting policies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Our
	discussion and analysis of our financial condition and results of operations is based on our consolidated financial statements
	which have been prepared in accordance with accounting principles generally accepted in the United States. The preparation of
	our financial statements in conformity with generally accepted accounting principles in the United States requires our management
	to make estimates and assumptions that affect the reported amounts of assets and liabilities and disclosure of contingent assets
	and liabilities at the date of the financial statements and the reported amounts of revenues and expenses during the reporting
	period. These amounts and disclosures could potentially be materially different under other assumptions and conditions. These
	are our management&rsquo;s best estimates based on experience and historical data, however, actual results could differ materially
	from these estimates. Our significant accounting principles are presented within Note 2 to our Consolidated Financial Statements
	attached to this annual report. While all the accounting policies impact the financial statements, certain policies may be viewed
	to be critical. Management believes that the following policies are those that are most important to the portrayal of our financial
	condition and results of operations and for fully understanding and evaluating our reported results:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: .5IN; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	a.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Inventories:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Inventories
	are valued at the lower of cost or market value. Cost is determined using the moving average cost method.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Inventory
	write-offs and write-downs are provided to cover risks arising from slow-moving items or technological obsolescence.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35.45PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: .5IN; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	b.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 0PT; PADDING-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Impairment
	of Long-Lived Assets and Goodwill
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Impairment
	of long-lived assets:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company's long-lived assets are reviewed for impairment in accordance with ASC 360-10, Accounting for the Impairment or Disposal
	of Long-Lived Asset, whenever events or changes in circumstances indicate that the carrying amount of an asset (or asset group)
	may not be recoverable. Recoverability of assets to be held and used is measured by a comparison of the carrying amount of an
	asset (or asset group) to the future undiscounted cash flows expected to be generated by the assets (or asset group). If such
	assets are considered to be impaired, the impairment to be recognized is measured as the amount by which the carrying amount of
	the assets exceeds their fair value. The fair value of the brand name and customer list related intangibles was determined by
	the Income Approach method. Assumptions in the fair value assessment included: the impact of changes in economic conditions, revenue
	and cash flow forecasts for the remaining lives of the intangibles and the Company's weighted average cost of capital (&quot;WACC&quot;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	During
	2015, 2014 and 2013, no impairment losses have been identified.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Goodwill:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Goodwill
	represents excess of the costs over the net assets of businesses acquired. Under ASC 350,
<I>
	Intangibles - Goodwill and Other
</I>
	(&quot;ASC 350&quot;), goodwill is not amortized but instead is tested for impairment at least annually or between annual
	tests in certain circumstances, and written-down when impaired.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Goodwill
	as of December 31, 2015 and December 31, 2014 amounted to $4,122,000.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 32 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	26
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage32"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Testing
	Methodology:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company performs its annual impairment analysis of goodwill as of December 31 of each year, or more often if there are indicators
	of impairment present. The provisions of ASC 350 require that a two-step impairment test be performed on goodwill at the level
	of the reporting units. In the first step, or Step 1, the Company compares the fair value of each reporting unit to its carrying
	value. If the fair value exceeds the carrying value of the net assets, goodwill is considered not impaired, and the Company is
	not required to perform further testing. If the carrying value of the net assets exceeds the fair value, then the Company must
	perform the second step, or Step 2, of the impairment test in order to determine the implied fair value of goodwill. To determine
	the fair value used in Step 1, the Company uses discounted cash flows. If and when the Company is required to perform a Step 2
	analysis, determining the fair value of its net assets and its off-balance sheet intangibles would require it to make judgments
	that involve the use of significant estimates and assumptions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	reporting unit of the Company for purposes of the impairment test is the Company's RFID and Mobile Solutions division. Discrete
	financial information is available for this component of the business. Management regularly reviews the operating results of this
	component.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company determined the fair value of the reporting unit using the Income Approach, which utilizes a discounted cash flow model,
	as it believes that this approach best approximates the reporting unit's fair value at this time. Judgments and assumptions related
	to revenue, operating income, future short-term and long-term growth rates, weighted average cost of capital, interest, capital
	expenditures, cash flows, and market conditions are inherent in developing the discounted cash flow model. The material assumptions
	used for the Income Approach for 2015 were five years of projected net cash flows, WACC of 16% and a long-term growth rate of
	2.5%. The Company considered historical rates and current market conditions when determining the discount and growth rates to
	use in its analyses. If these estimates or their related assumptions change in the future, the Company may be required to record
	impairment charges for its goodwill.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	aggregate fair value of the Company depends on various factors, some of which are qualitative and involve management judgment,
	including stable backlog coverage and experience in meeting operating cash flow targets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<U>
	Testing
	Results:
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	During
	2015, 2014 and 2013 no impairment losses have been identified.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	c.

	Revenue
	recognition:
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company derives its revenues mainly from the sale of products and support services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Revenues
	from product sales, related to both the Supply Chain Solutions and RFID and Mobile Solutions segments, are recognized in accordance
	with SAB 104,
<I>
	Revenue Recognition
</I>
	(&quot;ASC 605&quot;) when delivery has occurred, persuasive evidence of an arrangement
	exists, the vendor's fee is fixed or determinable, no further obligation exists, and collectability is reasonably assured.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Revenues
	from maintenance and support services related to license are recognized ratably over the period of the support contract.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	For
	revenues from customized software solutions, since the Company is unable to obtain reasonable dependable estimates of the total
	effort required for completion, the Company follows the guidance in ASC 605-35, (&quot;ASC 605-35&quot;), whereby the Company
	applies the completed contract method. Under the completed contract method, all revenue and related costs of revenue are deferred
	and recognized upon completion. Provisions for estimated losses on contracts in process are recognized in the period such losses
	are determined.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<BR>
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Legal
	Contingencies
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company is not a party to any legal proceedings.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	5A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Operating
	Results
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	All
	share and per share data in this report is reported after giving effect to the 1 for 4 reverse stock split that was effected on
	December 14, 2012.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<B>
	Comparison
	of 2015 and 2014
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Consolidated
	revenues decreased by 7.2% to $25.6 million in year 2015 from $27.6 million in year 2014, which is mainly related to a decrease
	in revenues of the RFID and Mobile division from the food retail chain in Israel.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Gross
	profit for 2015 was $5.1 million (gross margin of 20%), as compared to $5.0 million (gross margin of 18.3%) for 2014. The increase
	in gross profit margin was in both divisions and was a result of strengthening our business relations with our existing customer
	base and a reduction in allowance of slow moving inventory.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Operating
	expenses decreased to $4.45 million in 2015 from $4.9 million in 2014. The reduction in expenses is attributed mainly to: (a)
	a decrease in allowance for bad debt in the amount of $83K in 2015, as compared to an increase in allowance for bad debt in the
	amount of $95,000 in 2014; (b) a decrease in sales and marketing expenses due to a reduction in workforce.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Financial
	expenses were reduced to $376,000 in year 2015 from $444,000 in year 2014. The reduction in financial expenses is attributed to
	a reduction in loans and currency exchange rates.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Tax
	benefit for year 2015 amounted to $22,000 as compared to taxes on income of $108,000 in year 2014, which includes write off of
	tax assets in the amount of $85,000.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Net
	income for year 2015 was $334,000 as compared to net loss of $433,000 in 2014. The basic and diluted net income per share in 2015
	was $0.17, compared to basic and diluted net loss per share of $0.3 in 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<B>
	Comparison
	of 2014 and 2013
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Consolidated
	revenues grew by 6.5% to $27.6 million in year 2014 from $25.9 million in year 2013. The growth was attributed to an increase
	in the Israeli market demand, experienced by both the Supply Chain division and the RFID and Mobile division.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Gross
	profit for 2014 was $5.0 million (gross margin of 18.3%), as compared to $5.0 million (gross margin of 19.4%) for 2013. The decrease
	in the gross margin is attributed mainly to an inventory write off that amounted to $404,000 in year 2014 as compared to $121,000
	in year 2013. Inventory write-offs are made to cover risks arising from slow-moving items or technological obsolescence.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Operating
	expenses increased to $4.9 million in 2014 from $4.5 million in 2013. The increase in expenses is attributed mainly to: (a) an
	increase in allowance for bad debt, which amounted to $95,000 in 2014 as compared to income from reversal of allowance for bad
	debt in the amount of $146,000 in 2013; (b) an increase in technological workforce.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Financial
	expenses were reduced to $444,000 in year 2014 from $549,000 in 2013. The decrease in financial expenses is attributed to a reduction
	in loans and to currency exchange rate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Tax
	on income for 2014 increased to $108,000 from $13,000, as a result of a write-off of income tax assets due to ongoing losses in
	BOS Odem.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

	&nbsp;&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Net
	loss for year 2014 was $433,000 as compared to a break even result in 2013. The basic and diluted net loss per share in 2014
	was $0.3, compared to basic and diluted net profit per share of $0.0 in 2013.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Variability
	of Quarterly Operating Results
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Our
	revenues and profitability may vary in any given year, and from quarter to quarter, depending on the mix of products sold. In
	addition, due to potential competition, uncertain market acceptance and other factors, we may be required to reduce prices for
	our products in the future.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Our
	future results will be affected by a number of factors including our ability to:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 18PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	These
	results may also be affected by currency exchange rate fluctuations and interest rate and economic conditions in the geographical
	areas in which we operate. There can be no assurance that our historical trends will continue, or that revenues, gross profit
	and net income in any particular quarter will not be lower than those of the preceding quarters, including comparable quarters.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Impact
	of Inflation and Currency Fluctuations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	We
	are exposed to the risk that the NIS, after adjustment for inflation in Israel, will appreciate in relation to the U.S. dollar.
	In that event, the dollar-measured cost of our operations in Israel will increase and our dollar-measured results of operations
	will be adversely affected. In 2015 and 2014, the NIS depreciated by approximately 0.3% and 12%, respectively against the U.S.
	dollar, and in 2013 the NIS appreciated by approximately 7.0%, against the U.S. dollar. In 2013 the annual inflation rate in Israel
	was approximately 1.82%. In year 2015 and 2014, the annual deflation was 1% and 0.2%, respectively. Therefore, the U.S. dollar
	cost of our Israeli operations decreased in 2015 and in 2014, and increased in 2013. We cannot predict whether in the future the
	NIS will appreciate against the U.S. dollar or vice versa. Any increase in the rate of inflation in Israel, unless the increase
	is offset on a timely basis by a devaluation of the NIS in relation to the U.S. dollar, will increase our labor and other costs,
	which will increase the U.S. dollar cost of our operations in Israel and harm our results of operations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Effective
	Corporate Tax Rate
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Israeli corporate tax rate was 25% in 2012 and in 2013 and 26.5% in 2014 and in 2015.&nbsp;Effective January 1, 2016 the corporate
	tax rate is 25%.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>

	29
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

<A NAME="eolPage35"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Grants
	and Participation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Under
	the Company's research and development agreements with the Office of the Chief Scientist (&quot;OCS&quot;) and pursuant to applicable
	laws, the Company is required to pay royalties at the rate of 3.5% of sales of products developed with funds provided by the OCS,
	up to an amount equal to 100% of the research and development grants (dollar-linked) received from the OCS. The obligation to
	pay these royalties is contingent upon actual sales of the products. Royalties payable with respect to grants received under programs
	approved by the OCS after January 1, 1999, are subject to interest on the U.S. dollar-linked value of the total grants received
	at the annual rate of LIBOR applicable to U.S. dollar deposits at the time the grants are received. Since 2006, we have not participated
	in research and development programs supported by the OCS.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	As
	of December 31, 2015, the Company has an outstanding off-balance sheet contingent obligation to pay royalties to the OCS, including
	interest, in the amount of approximately $3.7 million, with respect to the grants. During 2014 and 2015, the developed software
	for which the grant was received was no longer being sold. Accordingly, no royalty expenses were recorded during these years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Conditions
	in Israel
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	We
	are incorporated under the laws of the State of Israel, where we also maintain our headquarters and our research and development
	and manufacturing facilities. See Item 3D. &ldquo;Risk Factors &ndash; Risks Relating to Our Location in Israel&rdquo; for a description
	of governmental, economic, fiscal, monetary or political polices or factors that have materially affected or could materially
	affect our operations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	5B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Liquidity
	and Capital Resources
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	In
	the year ended on December 31, 2015 the Company had a net income of $334,000, as compared to year 2014, in which the Company incurred
	net losses of $433,000, and to year 2013, in which the Company incurred breakeven net income. In the years ended December 31,
	2015, 2014 and 2013 the Company generated a positive cash flow from operating activities amounting to $370,000 in 2015, $1.1 million
	in 2014 and $1.0 million in 2013. The Company's cash and cash equivalents amounted to $1.4 million as of December 31, 2015. The
	Company had a positive working capital of $5,246,000, $634,000 and a negative working capital of $500,000 as of December 31, 2015,
	December 31, 2014 and December 31, 2013, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	As
	of December 31, 2015, we had $3.46 million in long-term debt (net of current maturities of $400,000) and no short term bank loans.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	On
	January 30, 2014, the Company requested shareholders who hold 161,000 warrants to defer the registration of the shares underlying
	the warrants issued to them. In connection with such deferral, the warrants&rsquo; exercise period was extended by an additional
	two years to July 22, 2017 and the exercise price of the warrants was adjusted to $7.43 (which was the weighted average closing
	price of the Company's shares in the 20 days ending January 30, 2014). The extension of warrants held by Telegraph Hill Capital
	was approved by the Company's shareholders meeting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company&rsquo;s loans from Bank Leumi are secured by:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	First
	ranking fixed charges on the goodwill of the Company and our Israeli subsidiaries, on
	our shareholdings in the Israeli subsidiaries, on certain Bank Leumi accounts, customer
	contract and on all the fixed assets; and

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	30
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

<A NAME="eolPage36"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 18PT; TEXT-INDENT: -18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company also guarantees the liabilities of its Israeli subsidiaries to Bank Leumi and each of its Israeli subsidiaries guarantees
	the Company&rsquo;s liabilities to Bank Leumi.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	In
	January 2016, the Company and its Israeli subsidiaries entered into an agreement with Bank Leumi, which converted all of their
	bank debt, which amounted to $3.86 million as of December 31, 2015, into long term loans. The long term loans are payable by 2018.
	The agreement includes covenants to maintain certain financial ratios related to shareholders' equity, EBITDA and operating results.
	In addition, the Company and its Israeli subsidiaries undertook to repay the bank $1.2 million plus interest, in 36 equal instalments
	commencing 2016. The remaining balance of the loans which will amount to $2.66 million shall be paid on December 31 2018, but
	the Company' management believes that during year 2018 the Company will enter into an agreement with Bank Leumi to spread the
	payment over number of years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company paid in full its long term loan from Bank HaPoalim in November 2015. Bank HaPoalim&rsquo;s loan agreements had contained
	various financial covenants which required that the Company's Israeli subsidiaries maintain certain financial ratios and levels
	of profitability. These covenants were cancelled on February 2, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	In
	June 2013, the Company entered into a Standby Equity Distribution Agreement, (the &ldquo;June 2013 SEDA&rdquo;), with YA Global.
	The June 2013 SEDA provided that, upon the terms and subject to the conditions set forth therein, YA Global was committed to purchase
	up to $600,000 of the Company&rsquo;s Ordinary Shares over a two-year commitment period.&nbsp; The Company issued 7,500 shares
	to YA Global as a commitment fee for this financing. As of June 2014, the Company had drawn the full $600,000 on this equity line
	for which it issued an aggregate of 107,782 Ordinary Shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	In
	February 2014, the Company entered into a second Standby Equity Distribution Agreement, (the &ldquo;February 2014 SEDA&rdquo;)
	with YA Global. The February 2014 SEDA provides that, upon the terms and subject to the conditions set forth therein, YA Global
	is committed to purchase up to $2,000,000 of the Company&rsquo;s Ordinary Shares over a three-year commitment period.&nbsp;The
	Company issued 13,715 shares to YA Global as a commitment fee for this financing. The purchase price of the Ordinary Shares will
	be at a 5% discount off the lowest daily VWAP (as defined in the agreement) of the Ordinary Shares during the five consecutive
	trading days following the date of an advance notice from us (provided such VWAP is greater than or equal to 90% of the last closing
	price of the Ordinary Shares at the time of delivery of the advance notice). From time to time, at the Company&rsquo;s discretion,
	subject to complying with the conditions set forth in the February 2014 SEDA, the Company may present YA Global with advance notices
	to purchase up to $500,000 of the Company&rsquo;s shares as more fully described in the February 2014 SEDA. As of March 31, 2016,
	the Company has drawn $1,348,000 on this equity line, for which it issued an aggregate of 429,567 Ordinary Shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	In
	February 2014, in addition to the February 2014 SEDA, the Company entered into a Note Purchase Agreement with YA Global, under
	which YA Global provided the Company with a one year bridge loan in the amount of $500,000.&nbsp;&nbsp;The bridge loan was repayable
	in nine equal monthly installments commencing three months after the receipt of the loan and was paid in full by February 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	In
	February 2015 the Company entered into a third Standby Equity Distribution Agreement, (the &ldquo;February 2015 SEDA&rdquo;) with
	YA Global. The February 2015 SEDA provides that, upon the terms and subject to the conditions set forth therein, YA Global is
	committed to purchase up to $1,300,000 of the Company&rsquo;s Ordinary Shares over a 40-month commitment period. The Company issued
	28,930 shares to YA Global as a commitment fee for this financing. The purchase price of the Ordinary Shares will be at a 7% discount
	off the average share trading price, calculated as described in the SEDA. The Ordinary Shares to be issued to YA Global under
	the SEDA will be issued pursuant to an exemption from registration under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.&nbsp; Pursuant
	to the SEDA, the Company has an obligation to file a registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission covering
	the resale by YA Global of any shares to be issued to YA Global under the SEDA. As of March 31, 2016, no amount has been drawn
	on this equity line.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	On
	November 27, 2014, the Company entered into a private placement agreement with Novel Infrastructure Ltd., a company owned by a
	Hong Kong investor. Under the agreement, the Company issued 128,147 Ordinary Shares (then equal to 7.2% of the outstanding shares
	of the Company following the investment) at a price per share of $3.902, or $500,000 in total.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	On
	June 10, 2015, the Company entered into a Share Purchase Agreement with certain investors, including YA Global, members of management,
	and certain business partners of the Company, under which the Company raised an aggregate net amount of $573,000 at a price per
	share of $&nbsp;2.406.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;We
	finance our activities by different means, including short and long-term loans, cash flow from operating activities and issuance
	of Company shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Working
	capital requirements will vary from time-to-time and will depend on numerous factors, including but not limited to, the operating
	results, scope of sales and supplier and customer credit terms.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	We
	have in-balance sheet financial instruments and off-balance sheet contingent commitments. Our in-balance sheet financial instruments
	consist of our assets and liabilities. Our cash is invested in U.S. dollars and NIS interest bearing deposits with banks. As of
	December 31, 2015, our trade receivables&rsquo; and trade payables&rsquo; aging days were 101 and 83 days, respectively. The fair
	value of our financial instruments is similar to their book value. Our off-balance sheet contingent commitments consist of: (a)
	royalty commitments that are directly related to our future revenues, (b) lease commitments of our premises and vehicles, and
	(c) directors' and officers&rsquo; indemnities, in excess of the proceeds received from liability insurance which we obtain.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	The
	Company had working capital of $5,246,000 as of December 31, 2015. It is the Company's opinion that current working capital is
	sufficient for the Company's present requirements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	Cash
	Flows
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Net
	cash provided by operating activities in 2015, 2014 and 2013 was $370,000, $1.1 million and $1 million, respectively. The decrease
	in net cash provided by operating activities from $1.1 million in year 2014 to $370,000 in year 2015, related mainly to an increase
	of 10.4% in the fourth quarter of year 2015 revenues from $6.67 million to $7.37 million in comparable quarter in year 2014, which
	caused an increase in the Company&rsquo;s working capital requirements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Net
	cash used in investment activities in years 2015 and 2014 amounted to $47,000 and $81,000, respectively. Net cash provided by
	investment activities in year 2013 amounted to $210,000.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; COLOR: #000000">
	Net
	cash used in financing activities in 2015, 2014 and 2013 amounted to $426,000, $486,000 and $607,000, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
